website_summaries.verdict: You'll spend a bit more for this heated mattress pad, but many consumers are happy with the overall quality and comfort level.
pros: Praised for the fact that it heats up fully and quickly thanks to a rapid heat-up feature
Includes 10 distinct warming settings and an auto-off feature
cons: The control dials only light up for a moment, which can make it hard to read the settings in the dark

customer_reviews.title: Works great, until it doesn't work at all
customer_reviews.text: I was actually going to give this 4 stars yesterday. It's very comfortable, heats up quickly and evenly. I don't like that the elements aren't the full length of the pad, which would've cost one star. However, I went to turn it on for the THIRD time and it no longer works. This was so expensive to only last two uses. Of course, since I bought it in the summer (they have a tendency to be sold out or more expensive once fall hits), I'm outside of the 30 day return period and cannot find any way to contact the seller.
customer_reviews.author: Ellanya Seifried

customer_reviews.title: Junk!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this VERY expensive mattress pad for my Mom's bed & was looking forward to keeping her toasty warm this winter. The pad worked twice, then consistently began failing (with the letter F appearing on the control). Now I don't dare use it as it clearly has an electrical problem. What a waste of money!
customer_reviews.author: K. Van Kainen

customer_reviews.title: ON a regular bed they would be perfect as they are cushy and heat up quickly but
customer_reviews.text: I put these on my beds and raised them up to lie on thumbnut they slipped down making a lump under my sheet. They were returned. ON a regular bed they would be perfect as they are cushy and heat up quickly but...on a split bed that raises up and down - nope!
customer_reviews.author: Helen M. Sabin

customer_reviews.title: Good product, heats evenly.
customer_reviews.text: It heats evenly across the whole bed. I bought the ONE control model for my Queen sized bed. Like most electric heated mattress pads, the wires on this one are uncomfortable. That is NOT a flaw, that is a drawback on the "mattress pad" style. BUT, I found a solution. You've seen those 3' x 5' rolled up blankets in the grocery stores, or at K-Mart.. they range from $4 -$7. I put one on TOP of this mattress pad, and then I put the sheet on the bed. That was just enough padding to eliminate the discomfort from the stiff wires.
customer_reviews.author: E. Christina Dabis

customer_reviews.title: I think its a fake
customer_reviews.text: The quality is awful. It tore when I put it on the bed, it only gets warm, and has no proper label for UL. And there is a big bulky seam at the end by your head.
customer_reviews.author: Joy Daniels

customer_reviews.title: Provides real warmth!
customer_reviews.text: Heats up fast! Provides more than adequate range of heat. Controller is not as hard to see as I had heard. Easy to use. The whole Electrowarmth sales pitch of heat rising is technically correct but, doesn't really apply to this product so much as heat rising is more concerned with the principle of convection. This product however, is practically operating on the principle of heat conduction only. It still works well though. So far so good.
customer_reviews.author: George King

customer_reviews.title: Love the Electrowarmth Bed warmer!
customer_reviews.text: Since we just got a new bed, we needed the king bedwarmer and were pleased to see the style has changed over the years. My husband and his family introduced Electrowarmth bedwarmers to me almost 50 years ago. We've always used them, and have bought them for our kids and I even gave one to a friend who lived in a very cold house, and it helped her comfort very much. We can't say enough good things about the Electrowarmth bedwarmers. We are lucky to live about 40 miles from Danville, Ohio, where these are made and have even dropped them off when they needed repair (which isn't often if you take care of them according to the instructions).
customer_reviews.author: Burger Lover - Dalton

customer_reviews.title: Great, even if a bit expensive.
customer_reviews.text: This provides some excellent uniform heat. I have two minor annoyances that kept it from a 5-star rating. 1: the display goes dark after a few seconds, meaning it has to be turned off/on or temp adjusted to read it. Not a big deal, just annoying. It's quite dim in the first place, so I can't see how leaving the display lit would be a distraction. 2: there is a seam running across the pad at about lower should height. I don't normally feel this on my back, but cannot understand why there is a seam there at all.
customer_reviews.author: Chicago Pro

customer_reviews.title: Only worked for  8 months
customer_reviews.text: This heated mattress pad only worked for 8 months, from September 2018 until May 2019; then it would turn off randomly. Sometimes it would seem to work when we wanted to preheat the mattress on cold nights. Then, we would go to bed and the controls were off and the bed was icy cold. All night long, we had to keep pushing the buttons to turn the controls back on to keep the bed warm. Finally, the heating element quit altogether.
customer_reviews.author: Valerie

customer_reviews.title: Critical flaw means it goes back
customer_reviews.text: I wonder if the company understands that this is a product you're supposed to lie down on. Because they made the absurd design decision to have a gigantic ridge going across the pad about 3/4 of the way up the pad. This is to connect the unheated top part of the pad, so your head and shoulders don't bake, with the heated bottom part. This was a good idea with terrible execution. You feel the ridge exquisitely. It is like sleeping on a rolled-up sock. Why oh why would they do this? Returned.
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: Good but I have a problem with the controls
customer_reviews.text: Pro's are it is fairly comfortable. But I have a mattress pad over it though. Con's are that the light that shows you it's on and where it is set is really hard to see but also doesn't stay on. I have got up on some mornings and realized I still had it on. That said my sunbeam one I had previously would stsy lit up.
customer_reviews.author: Mjd3

customer_reviews.title: Best Night's Sleep Ever!
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I don't like electric blankets, but now that we are 80 we find we need extra warmth in the winter. This electric mattress pad is perfect! The bed is warm when we get in and keeps us cozy all night. Simple controls (dual for the queen size) can be adjusted in the dark. My asthma and bad back had me sleeping in my recliner with heating pad, but now most nights I sleep all night in the bed and get up refreshed and relaxed. We looked for one that was American made, and this is well made and easy to install. Love it, wish we had bought one years ago!
customer_reviews.author: Dixie Dame

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for!
customer_reviews.text: I dislike being cold and really dislike getting into a cold bed in the winter! No more wearing long pants and socks! This heated mattress cover changed my bed life. I wish it was on a timer, because sometimes I wake up too hot but other than that I love it. It does turn itself off. There is a seam going across the shoulder or neck area but I have never noticed it while in bed. Those with joint or back issues, like me, will love this. Well made. Fits my half of our king sized adjustable Comfortpedic memory mattress perfectly and theres is no problem when I raise the mattress. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: lisalou

customer_reviews.title: Heats great but not padded enough for comfort
customer_reviews.text: I needed to replace my old heated mattress pad that was no longer keeping temperature accurately - either too hot or too cold. This pad's heating elements worked perfectly, keeping a consistent temperature all night. But there isn't much padding; I could feel every heating element under me which made it not comfortable to sleep on. I've solved the problem by purchasing a nicely padded mattress top. Slight upping the temperature of the pad under the mattress top is giving me an excellent night's sleep.
customer_reviews.author: Telcontar

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING PAIN RELIEF
customer_reviews.text: I have terrible rheumetological body pain all over. The only place I get relief is my medical massage place, which has a heated table. So i decided to get one for home and lo and behold this is AMAZING. I can’t feel the wires at all on my memory foam mattress Got the warranty on it too so i can have it for years to come!
customer_reviews.author: M. Gibbons

customer_reviews.title: Warm but slippery
customer_reviews.text: Does a fabulous job warming the bed. But the top is slick as can be and my sheets slide all over my bed. I like my bottom, fitted sheet to stay tight and wrinkle-free, but that's impossible on top of this bed pad. But, again, it does a great job heating the bed. And I like that it shuts itself off in the morning so that's one less thing I have to remember.
customer_reviews.author: BeHaven

customer_reviews.title: Money doesn't mean quality.
customer_reviews.text: My temperature control keeps saying, "F" when adjusting temperature. Unplugging the cords from wall and blanket; to rest device, only works a few times and it goes back to saying, "F" again. Paid a lot of money for something that doesn't fully work (my wife's temperature control works just fine).

customer_reviews.title: Heats Nicely
customer_reviews.text: This pad warms the bed nicely, but I would not call it a high end heated mattress pad. It had the older, thicker wires which can be felt through the padding. They end about where your pillow is. There is a seam there which is somewhat thick. Neither the wires nor bulky seam are hard to get used to and the pad fits a 13 inch mattress without problem. The selling point for me was the availability of a single control for the queen size pad. Nearly all queen size pads have two controls.
customer_reviews.author: L. L. Maron

customer_reviews.title: What a great product
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I truly love this heated pad, it allows each of us to set the warmth factor for each side of the bed, and unlike most heating pads/blankets it stays on all night no built in time out!
customer_reviews.author: PaulM

customer_reviews.title: Great product- perfect for avoiding cold feet and sleeping with just the degree of warmth you need
customer_reviews.text: Really like this; it is perfect for what I wanted. Fits the twin long mattress very nicely and I turn it on one of the lower settings and have avoided cold feet this winter so get to sleep easily and have removed two blankets from the bed. Really like this product- it delivers!
customer_reviews.author: discerning consumer

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the money!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I travel all over the USA for work and lodging in a 5th wheel camper. At first glance on this product I argued with my self paying 145.00 for this are you kidding.(RV's typically have short queen size mattresses) I'm glamping in the winter ( approx 10 degrees ish). But, after using it now for a few months no more arguments. Just pay the money. I know it sucks but, you'll be very comfortable sleeping at night.
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: Two Controls on Full Size
customer_reviews.text: I looked everywhere I could before I found this heated mattress pad with DUAL CONTROLS for a FULL SIZE bed. I had just about given up, as all the others had two separate controls only on queen size or larger. Exactly as advertised and works great! Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: R. Snyder

customer_reviews.title: it warms me up quickly; decent dials
customer_reviews.text: It is relatively easy to install on the bed. Just read the logical directions.. Warms quickly. Separate controls and plugs for each side. The sheet bunches up a little at first, rather than laying flat. I will see if it settles down over time. The dial is not well lit, but you can learn how to use it easily. The numbers light up a little for fairly easy viewing.
customer_reviews.author: Philip J

customer_reviews.title: Comfy and warm
customer_reviews.text: Mattress gets comfortably warm when on, and the single control means I don't have to stretch to both sides to set it up appropriately. The unheated part at the top means it won't bake underneath your pillows, and also provides a place for you to rest your elbows when up (far too) late reading. I strongly recommend for the cold and lazy people that like to read late at night.
customer_reviews.author: Todd

customer_reviews.title: Horribly uncomfortable.
customer_reviews.text: The pad is hard as a rock and you can feel every wire. Like sleeping on a chain-link fence. It also has annoying plastic labels sewn on near the foot that crinkle and make noise every time I move. I will not be keeping this.
customer_reviews.author: Heather S

customer_reviews.title: Short lasted
customer_reviews.text: Great for heat and individual control. But! Of the last three heated sheets we have had this has lasted the shortest (6 weeks) and caused much consternation with the slippery nature of having as a bottom sheet. Not quite sure why, perhaps too big for our king mattress
customer_reviews.author: Taking not giving

customer_reviews.title: GREAT
customer_reviews.text: Love this new heating mattress since I had to buy a Twin Ex-Long bed
customer_reviews.author: Noreen M. Knutsen

customer_reviews.title: Kiss the blankets goodbye
customer_reviews.text: After I got out of an extended stay at a hospital I was cold all of the time. I was piling 5 blankets on top of myself every night and I was still cold. I bought this, turned it up half way and now I only need a top sheet. It lasts all night long. Also, not sure who would need to turn it up to the highest setting (Satan, maybe?) but it’s a good device. Would recommend
customer_reviews.author: C.J.

customer_reviews.title: Comes with 2 controllers. Works great and stays on all night.
customer_reviews.text: Comes with 2 controllers. Works great and stays on all night. I wouldn't live without this at this point. I absolutely love it. Had it a few months no problems at all. Plenty of material so it wraps around the bed easily.

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality-better than Chinese knock offs
customer_reviews.text: Nicely made and arrives in a zippered bag. Has dual control for left and right side of mattress. Top section where pillows go doesn’t heat up. Heats up quickly so no need to set to high then lower the setting.recommend over other brands.
customer_reviews.author: h stewart

customer_reviews.title: Tends to travel
customer_reviews.text: The unit does a good job of warming the bed; I never have put it up to maximum because it seems very warm to me at number 2 or number 3. The downside is that the slithery fabric tends to bunch up and cause sheets to bunch and slide. This has not been enough to interfere with my sleep but I do have to straighten everything out when I make the bed in the morning. A restless sleeper might have problems.
customer_reviews.author: H. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: After trying two different electric blankets, I decided to go back to what I knew. As youths, we used electric mattress pads and always stayed warm in bed. A good electric mattress pad is worth the almost triple price of the blanket. We don’t regret this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Rod T.

customer_reviews.title: Wonder Gift for Continually Cold Husband
customer_reviews.text: My husband is always cold and I face the opposite problem. I bought this dual control heated pad for him as an early Christmas present. I just turn his side up to the highest setting about 40 minutes before he retires for the night. His side is warm and toasty when he gets in. He never fails to let me know it’s the best present I could have given him!
customer_reviews.author: Rosie Lovejoy-Cunningham

customer_reviews.title: It's Good
customer_reviews.text: I find that most California size bedding is not adequate .I bought this particular California size bed warmer because it was a dual dial but as you see from the photo it is not a perfect fit .The price I didn't mind but the size should be much better.I have to say the quality otherwise is good ,you don't feel any cords and a warm bed at nite is a dream ! I will keep it but there is room for improvement on the size ....with most California bedding
customer_reviews.author: prince

customer_reviews.title: Well made, but can't accurately review it.
customer_reviews.text: I didn't use this product. Bought it for my Brother who is a stroke patient. He said the heat (on low) in the area of his upper back was too hot. That may have been due to personal nerve sensitivity. The pad was returned to Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Marge75

customer_reviews.title: Control not lighted when you need it.
customer_reviews.text: Would have given 5 Stars if the dials were lighted. It's difficult to see the controls if you want to change the temptature when your in bed. The control lights up after you press a button, but which button did you press? The control need to be lighted continuously.
customer_reviews.author: Jodi Lodde

customer_reviews.title: does not work as well on an air bed
customer_reviews.text: I would like the light to stay on all the time
customer_reviews.author: Ed M.

customer_reviews.title: I love this pad
customer_reviews.text: We moved from Southern California to Idaho last year and it does get much colder up here. This will keep you nice and toasty no matter how cold it gets. I love this pad.
customer_reviews.author: Douglas C. Green

customer_reviews.title: Great heat but slippery.
customer_reviews.text: I love this mattress pad. It is welcome even when the weather isn't cold. What I do not like is the material on the outer layer. It is very slippery. Sheets slide like crazy. I had to purchase another item to hold the sheets down which is another problem. One has to lift the mattress and secure the grippers which is impossible to do alone. I suggest that a different fabric be used on the outside of this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Derr

customer_reviews.title: sending it back it does not have 2 controls for ...
customer_reviews.text: sending it back it does not have 2 controls for the full sized bed as it states - that is clearly false advertisement. Very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: fran

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Works great, doesn't feel that warm at first but then gets very warm while you're sleeping. Only gripe is, as other reviewers have said, the light on the dial is not sufficient.
customer_reviews.author: M.K.

customer_reviews.title: -1 star because i dont like the controller too much
customer_reviews.text: every other pad i have used has had a light on it that stays on. no light makes it hard to find the controller in the dark. so far it is heating up just fine.
customer_reviews.author: E. Buchan

customer_reviews.title: Heats up fast and warmer than most.
customer_reviews.text: Replaced an older warmer with this one. It gets warmer faster than our old one.... much faster. Easy to set up. The heated area extends from the feet to about the shoulders. It has separate controls for each side of the bed. I would definitely recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Murph

customer_reviews.title: Great mattress warmer
customer_reviews.text: I'm so happy with this because the quilted top really does keep you from feeling the heating wires through your sheets. Other brands I've tried I needed another mattress pad on top of it to make it comfortable. The only improvement I would suggest is a back-lighted control. Right now it's an LCD display and I need to turn on a lamp to change the temperature. It needs a light to show if it's on or off, too. But aside from that, I really recommend this mattress warmer.
customer_reviews.author: kGj Seattle Washington

customer_reviews.title: A+ The only brand to buy
customer_reviews.text: Replaced a Sunbeam that was a year old and $230 and it crapped out. This one is stellar quality and 4 months in it is still going great. I WISH the LED light in the controller stayed on all the time its on, not just when your adjusting the level.
customer_reviews.author: John from Ct

customer_reviews.title: Like a Hot Shower
customer_reviews.text: This made the world of difference for us in the winter. Instead of getting into cold sheets, we would turn on the pad to max about one hour before retiring, and as my wife would say, "It's like getting into a hot shower". It really does help to relax the body to help it go to sleep more quickly. Just make sure that you turn it down before going to sleep.
customer_reviews.author: Walt Woodward

customer_reviews.title: Dual zones are da bomb
customer_reviews.text: Oh my gosh, the warmth never ends! Unless you run out of electricity or this shuts off automatically after 10 hours, you get the point. This had two controls and two heat zones with plenty of heart lenders to keep this ice cube comfortable. My husband loves being able to pre-warm the bed for me before I get home from work in the icy night. Hope this lasts a long time.
customer_reviews.author: M. Hubert

customer_reviews.title: finally found a heated mattress w/dual control
customer_reviews.text: we searched for dual controls for a full mattress which is almost impossible to find. after reading all of the reviews we decided to get this pad. we have NOT had any issues with it coming off, it stays put. it heats very well. we needed dual controls for the obvious reason, too hot, too cold. 12/2018 Over the years we have worn out several heated mattress pads, usually lasting a year or two. This one is still going strong! I hope to update in another 4 years.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Schraeder

customer_reviews.title: Heats up quickly. I knew from previous reviews that ...
customer_reviews.text: Heats up quickly. I knew from previous reviews that there was no backlight on display; I would have given 5 stars if it had.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Scales

customer_reviews.title: I'm in love!
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this mattress pad for several months now and I love it. I like that it has two controls so that my husband and I can choose our own settings. When I took the pad out of the packaging I was concerned that we would be able to feel the wires running through it whiling sleeping. This has not been a problem at all. You don't even notice that they are there. The pad is a little loose fitting on my mattress, but it really hasn't caused a problem.
customer_reviews.author: james

customer_reviews.title: Perfect warmth
customer_reviews.text: this electric mattress pad is perfect for me. However, I wish that the area under my pillow was heated.
customer_reviews.author: J29bean

customer_reviews.title: Heated Mattress Pad.
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this mattress pad for the last three nights and the wife and I really enjoy it. It has really helped her back and has allowed her to enjoy a good nights sleep without waking up with pain in the middle of the night. Thank you electrowarmth for this product. If you are in the market for a heated mattress pad this is the one to get.
customer_reviews.author: Paul J. Esposito

customer_reviews.title: Love this heated mattress pad!
customer_reviews.text: This RV heated mattress pad makes camping in colder months warm and cozy. Bought this last fall (2014) and it was stores in the camper throughout the cold Wisconsin winter, and we went to our camper this past weekend and it still worked great!
customer_reviews.author: Kim Gehrke

customer_reviews.title: Low quality
customer_reviews.text: Worst product ever seen, the controller burnt & blasted in my hand at the very first use thanks goodness i had’t removed the cover & my mom was right by the switch to turn it off, gifted it to my father but highly disappointed,
customer_reviews.author: Mani

customer_reviews.title: Nice and cozy warm
customer_reviews.text: We love the heated mattress pad. It heats fairly quickly and holds at that level all night. By the time you brush your teeth the bed is warm and cozy and ready for you. Our last one you had to put the heat level too high to get it to heat up and then you were too hot. This one is far superior.
customer_reviews.author: Carol R

customer_reviews.title: Awesome bed warmer
customer_reviews.text: This quilted mattress heater does exactly what it's suppose to do, keep you warm and cozy. I bought this because we have an RV and safety is the utmost. This warmer is rated for use in an RV. It is a little higher priced but works great on even 24 degree mornings. I will warn you that it is hard to get out of bed ;). Fits our queen size foam mattress nice and snug.
customer_reviews.author: Sharona

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: I just received this a few days ago and used it the first time last night. It is a very gentle heat, even at the high setting and that's just perfect for me. I am using a mattress pad over it, otherwise the wires might be an issue, and oh...the material is very slippery so you might have trouble keeping your sheets on it if you don't use a pad over it. Hopefully, this will last us a long time. If not...I will be back to update my review.
customer_reviews.author: Tigressbythetail

customer_reviews.title: Crawl into a nice warm bed!
customer_reviews.text: I love to sleep in a colder room - but I don't want to be cold! I turn this on a little while before we go to bed, set it warmer than we like to sleep with, and it makes the bed so nice and warm to crawl into! When we go to bed, we turn our controls low for a great night's sleep. No more waiting for your body to warm the bed!
customer_reviews.author: H. C. Keith

customer_reviews.title: Warm and happy!
customer_reviews.text: Fit is well designed. We have a thick, 13 inch mattress. It fits perfectly. The unit warms up quickly and evenly. The control module is easy to understand. My baby loves it. Also Made in the USA.
customer_reviews.author: Nvr Relct Eny1

customer_reviews.title: Buy it you won’t regret it!
customer_reviews.text: So glad I found in TwinXL wish I bought it sooner, I was worried cause some of the reviews didn’t say good things but I bought it anyway but boy I’m so so glad I did!
customer_reviews.author: Joseph

customer_reviews.title: Good!
customer_reviews.text: I like the sturdy design of the mattress warmer. Good quality and workmanship
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Good product. I like the queen with a single control. Would give 5 stars if it could be controlled remotely but you have to physically push the buttons.
customer_reviews.author: MrDeckard

customer_reviews.title: Great buy, easy to use
customer_reviews.text: One of the best products I have bought so far. There are so many levels of heat and easy to change which amount of heat you want. It is a fitted sheet which is so simple to put on and take off! I am very happy with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Alycia

customer_reviews.title: You won't be disappointed !
customer_reviews.text: I had the same one for over 7 years. The control became damaged due to a move. My husbands is still working. And we give it a real good workout in NH. We set the control on high to warm it up. Then put it down to 2 or 3. Excellent product.
customer_reviews.author: Mary G.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Washes up well. Decent fit, run a bit big. Recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn

customer_reviews.title: Great ... until it fails
customer_reviews.text: Great while it worked, great functionality and comfort ... however as per online reviews they do have a history of failure. I took a chance. One of the two controllers failed, checked by swapping sides of operation and just the controller is at fault. A shame but not a good record, the manufacturer needs to get real and address these issues as they are well documented.
customer_reviews.author: CliveH

customer_reviews.title: works great
customer_reviews.text: Husband loves it as he is cold all the time and this works for him
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: WRONG GIFT
customer_reviews.text: BOUGHT FOR MY SON AND DAUGHTER INLAW FOR CHRISTMAS BUT HE WAS DIAGNOSED WITH MS AND HEAT HAS AN ADVERSE EFFECT ON HIS CONDITION . SO IT IS IN THE CLOSET STILL IN THE PKG
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I was not happy with this product
customer_reviews.text: This mattress pad heats well and fits satisfactorily also. However, it has horizontal seams running across the pad in two different places and they create a ridge that is very uncomfortable to sleep on. i wouldn't purchase again or recommend this product. Also, the fabric on the top is slippery causing sheets to come untucked.
customer_reviews.author: R. Hayes-short

customer_reviews.title: Horrible product with no warranty
customer_reviews.text: Product died after two months - nothing I can do but eat the cost - very poor product- do not buy
customer_reviews.author: Fred

customer_reviews.title: LOVE this mattress pad cover
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this mattress pad cover! I generally purchase one every couple of years and hesitated about the price on this one but it is worth every penny! Love the fact that there are no coils under my head and neck and that the coils themselves are barely noticeable. Would recommend this item over others on the market.
customer_reviews.author: Donna J. Grant

customer_reviews.title: They only sent 1 Heated cover for one queen split bed
customer_reviews.text: I bought this heated mattress pad for 98.00 dollars for a split queen bed and only got one side. The picture and tile makes you believe tryouts get both sides.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy82

customer_reviews.title: nice product
customer_reviews.text: They warm nicely but the control dial doesn't stay lit so you don't know wether they are on or off. The cord on the dial is also a little short so they don't stay on the bedside table very well. We leave them on the floor.
customer_reviews.author: Gina Murphy

customer_reviews.title: Very Pleased
customer_reviews.text: Finding a full sized heated mattress pad with dual controls was a challenge! In addition to the dual controls, I really like the way this pad is made. I have had it for a couple of months now, and it is working well. It appears to be an excellent product.
customer_reviews.author: User Experience

customer_reviews.title: Hot bed
customer_reviews.text: Great control on the heating. Don't even know its there.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Rhodes

customer_reviews.title: queen heated mattress pad
customer_reviews.text: It is great, we had one in a full size and wanted the same brand on our bed and am very happy we made the switch. This one has great heating zones and is not to hot or to cold and warms the bed up nicely if we turn it on a while before going to bed a night. Fantastic item, would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Janine Bertone

customer_reviews.title: Great padding
customer_reviews.text: Love it...but wish the numerical control had a light on it. I have to turn on bedside lamp to see if on or off and heat setting.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I love this warmer. I have this one on the bed in our airstream trailer. It is just enough to warm the bed on chilly evenings.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I am loving that I can be warm at night ...
customer_reviews.text: I am loving that I can be warm at night. I only have one complaint. There is a seam around the shoulder area, about 1 ft. from the top of the pad that makes a big wrinkle. It is a little uncomfortable.
customer_reviews.author: farbell

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Took longer than I liked to get the item but it was worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: So very pleased with this mattress pad. Great for my husband's bad back. I followed other's advice and got a thin terry cloth mattress cover to go on top. We would probably be chasing our sheets across the bed without it.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: I like the mattress pad its self but the control light ...
customer_reviews.text: I like the mattress pad its self but the control light does not stay on. In other words, the small light that shows the number you have it set for does not stay on. If you have previously had a heated mattress pad, you know what I am talking about.
customer_reviews.author: Ann Fiebelkorn

customer_reviews.title: missing warranty
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with the mattress pad. I also paid for a warranty which was supposed to be mailed separately but I have not received it. Hope you can help. Marian Bason
customer_reviews.author: Marian B.

customer_reviews.title: I bought this for my daughter whom has MS. ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughter whom has MS. It really helps with her not having stiffness in the morning when she gets up.
customer_reviews.author: Paula Ross

customer_reviews.title: Could be better for price.
customer_reviews.text: Hard to see to turn it off, I have to put the light on to do so. It's a pain in the middle of the night.
customer_reviews.author: Elaine

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Takes a while to warm up. Doesn't get there as quick as other ones we have used.
customer_reviews.author: RK

customer_reviews.title: The one I had before had to be turned all the way down to a one and it was perfectly comfortable for the rest of the
customer_reviews.text: I had one of the early warming pads.I think the one I had was maybe 10 years old so I got rid of it and bought this one. This one doesn't work as well as the one I had for so many years. I need heat up around my shoulders and it needs to stay turned up to a higher temperature after you have it warmed up for the night. The one I had before had to be turned all the way down to a one and it was perfectly comfortable for the rest of the night
customer_reviews.author: JoAnn Brownlee

customer_reviews.title: doesn't have graduated coils. To get my feet warm ...
customer_reviews.text: doesn't have graduated coils. To get my feet warm I have to roast my kidneys. But it does have the dual control which was mandatory for our full bed.
customer_reviews.author: Louis H Freeman

customer_reviews.title: Great for me!
customer_reviews.text: Having claim to being the coldest human in the world, I love quick warm up - I like mine up on "toast" when I first get into bed. Excellent!!!
customer_reviews.author: Micki Vinson

customer_reviews.title: Makes bed toasty.
customer_reviews.text: Heat rises warming the bed. Better than an electric blanket and great for achy back or bones.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon M. Hopkins

customer_reviews.title: Great bed warmer
customer_reviews.text: Great bed warmer. The number screen does light up when you hit the up or down button. Hopefully this lasts longer than a different brand I had before this one!
customer_reviews.author: Abby

customer_reviews.title: Functional
customer_reviews.text: The mattress pad warms perfectly well. I have an adjustable bed that has a pillow top and was disappointed that it is not made for a deep mattress so it hugs the pillow top rather than the entire mattress. It is basic, but functional.
customer_reviews.author: AmSun

customer_reviews.title: Almost three years of use
customer_reviews.text: We love this mattress pad. This pad uses thinner wires than most so you don't feel them while laying in your bed. The controls work great and the heat output is very strong.
customer_reviews.author: C. Beard

customer_reviews.title: Really a super bed warmer
customer_reviews.text: Son LOVES the warm bed. We have had ours for years. Really a super bed warmer.
customer_reviews.author: Brule Lehman

customer_reviews.title: GOOD PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: This mattress pad takes comfort to a new level... It indeed, is better than a heated blanket... Set the control a few minutes before bed-time, and slide into an envelope of warmth! Found no problems with control or over-all construction; good fit, and plenty of cord length... A fine example of "MADE IN AMERICA" product... Recommend to anyone living north of Mason-Dixon line !!! Today 12/14/2017 marks 4yrs.since purchase of this electric pad. After continued regular use during that time,it still performs flawlessly....
customer_reviews.author: Happy Camper

customer_reviews.title: Mattress companies should just sew these into every mattress!
customer_reviews.text: We've been using this for 2 winters and absolutely love it. Dual zone is the way to go. I can be cool and comfortable and she can be warm and cozy all under the same blanket.
customer_reviews.author: FierceGT

customer_reviews.title: Well made and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Well made , ten temperature settings and complete and easy to read use and care instructions.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy in Lansing

customer_reviews.title: Big improvement over old one
customer_reviews.text: Lovely mild warmth. I have not used any setting higher than 3 yet, and that is for when I read in bed.. I use the first setting for sleeping. The weather hasn't been very cold yet, and our room is fairly warm.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product.
customer_reviews.text: This was the answer for my wife cold legs at night. Excellent product.
customer_reviews.author: Wayne G. Casper

customer_reviews.title: Very nice product , great quality
customer_reviews.text: I like the dual controls and that it does not heat where the pillows are.
customer_reviews.author: Nadia gamlieli

product_meta.title: Electrowarmth Twin Extra Long, White
product_meta.description: Size:Twin XLElectro warmth heated mattress pads radiate heat from below allowing you to relax into a deep and restful sleep. Proudly, manufactured in America by Electro warmth since 1939. Many improvements since then but the original "on the mattress" principle has been well proven. On cold winter nights, keeps the chills away with this safe and efficient warming mattress pad. The warming pad provides continual and even bed warmth throughout the night. Provides sleep inducing relaxing heat from below that is so soothing, like soaking in a tub of warm water. This relaxing sensation helps lull you to sleep. Soothes aches and pains. Real relief from arthritis. Fibromyalgia and other body aches. When you use the Electro warmth heated mattress pad you can turn down your home thermostat setting and save on your heating bills. They make great Christmas, birthday and anniversary presents your friends will be thanking you for many years to come. To operate, the warming pad is equipped with a comfort control. The comfort control levels increase from lo, 2 to 9, and hi settings. The mattress pad has a quick heat up feature on all settings, it comes on at high for a period of time then drops back to the setting you select, and you don’t even see this convenient feature. It also automatically shuts off heat after ten hours for extra safety, user convenience, and power conservation. When you turn the pad back on it comes back on at the last setting so you don’t have to change the setting very often. The warming pad is ETL approved and one of the benefits of this approval is that the unit shuts off if there is ever an overheat situation. A fitted skirt that wraps all the way around holds the pad in place and accommodates mattresses up to 13 inches thick. Safe for machine washing and drying. Available also in 3 twins, 5 full, 5 Queens, 2 Olympic Queens, 2 Kings, and 1 California king sizes. The mattress pad is covered by a limited 1-year warranty with a 30 day money back guarantee.
feature_bullets: 10 warming settings provide personalized comfort with quick heat up feature
Save energy cost turn down your home thermostat which pays for the bed warmer over and over again
Electro warmth warming system delivers consistent warmth and will safely shut down if ever used in an unsafe manner. Etl approved for your safety
Fully one year warranty with 30 day money back guarantee
